text: A POLITICAL CORRESPONDENT writes: Ban-the-bomb demonstrators thronged the Central Lobby of the House of Commons last night and formed a queue stretching for more than 200 yards outside in Old Palace Yard. About 2,000 lobbied M.P.s and harangued them on disarmament.
handwritten_text: A POLITICAL CORRESPONDENT writes: Ban-the-bomb demonstrators thronged the Central Lobby of the House of Commons last night and formed a queue stretching for more than 200 yards outside in Old Palace Yard. About 2,000 lobbied M.P.s and harangued them on disarmament.
